title: (Game Engine) Visual RPG Studio v2.0.58 [RePack]
description:
[VRS] Visual RPG Studio - Game Engine

Description 1:

Visual RPG Studio - 2D / 3D Game Engine
Ever think about making your own game, but you have no idea where to start? Visual RPG Studio gives you the power to make your own games without any special knowledge, training, or overpriced schooling. All you need is a computer and an imagination, and you're on the way to making your own game. No scripting is required; however our visual Lua scripting editor is built-in if you need it. No risk free 30 day trial! Start by downloading the software using the link below. 

Description 2:

Want to make your own games?
LastEnd Visual RPG Studio (VRS) gives you the power to create your own game without any special knowledge or training. All you need is a computer, an imagination, and you are on the way to making your own game. This 2D / 3D game engine and editor for Windows can support many types of games; not just RPG (Role Playing Games) because of its open project templates scripted in Visual Lua.
